name: Shoptown Dooter
description:
Shoptown dooter is a fun 2-4 local multiplayer game.

Compete with your friends in a last-man-standing Arena game, Control the map, pickup weapons, Dominate, Win.

Last man standing wins the game.

How to Play:

Aim and Fire! but dont forget to hide as well.

You start with a weak pistol, its not the best gun, but it still can make do. Try to pick up spawning weapons, prevent your enemies from picking up weapons to keep your advantage.

Enemy hiding behind cover? no worries, remove them and their cover with the throwable explosive barrels!

Your dash is a game winner, but it has a cooldown, use it wisely!

Game setup :

Enter Arena mode, join and press ready. Select a map and Play!

Press (M) or Start to Open additional game settings.

Controls :

Move with the left stick, Aim with the right stick.

Interact/Pickup with west button, Fire/Use with right trigger, Dash with left trigger.

You can't fire without aiming first, Sprinting is Automatic while not aiming.

-only one player can join with keyboard

move with WASD, aim with Arrows, Dash with shift.

Interact with (E), Fire with (Space).

_______________________

Enjoy!
